title: FS:T206 Joe Tinker Bat on Shoulder Piedmont 350 SGC 4
author: Epps

posts.post_title: FS:T206 Joe Tinker Bat on Shoulder Piedmont 350 SGC 4
posts.post_content:
For sale is a really nice T206 Joe Tinker with a Piedmont 350 back graded SGC 50/4. Card has really sharp corners and great centering. Only reason it graded a 4 is because of a small area of paper loss next to his eye. It looks just like a white speck. $320 delivered. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with questions or offers. 

$Sold
